elements.text: You are pushing a full cart of groceries, and you've just reached your car in the parking lot. You are worried about your ability to unload some of the heavier items without falling, and your heart starts to race. As you start to feel out of control, you focus on deep breaths and remind yourself it will be...

elements.name: Shopping Anxiety_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
